00003 import newtonERP.common.ActionLink;
00004 import newtonERP.module.generalEntity.ImageFile;
00005 import newtonERP.module.generalEntity.SplashScreen;
00006 import newtonERP.viewers.secondStep.ImageFileViewer;
00007 import newtonERP.viewers.secondStep.LinkViewer;
00008 
00013 public class SplashScreenViewer
00014 {
00015 
00020         public static String getHtmlCode(SplashScreen entity)
00021         {
00022                 String htmlCode = "";
00023                 for (ImageFile imageFile : entity.getImageFileList())
00024                         htmlCode += ImageFileViewer.getHtmlCode(imageFile);
00025 
00026                 htmlCode += "<ul>";
00027                 for (ActionLink link : entity.getActionLinkList())
00028                 {
00029                         String currentLinkHtml = LinkViewer.getHtmlCode(link);
00030                         if (currentLinkHtml.length() > 0)
00031                                 htmlCode += "<li>" + currentLinkHtml + "</li>";
00032                 }
00033                 htmlCode += "</ul>";
00034 
00035                 return htmlCode;
00036         }
00037 }
